content: I do not have access to up-to-date information and do not have personal experience, but i can provide some general information. yerevan, being the capital of armenia, has several sites and landmarks of cultural and historical importance, such as the armenian genocide memorial, republic square, and the matenadaran museum of ancient manuscripts. preserving and promoting these sites have undoubtedly boosted tourism in yerevan by attracting visitors interested in history and culture. the preservation efforts have also led to the restoration of old buildings and the creation of new tourist attractions, such as hotels and restaurants, that cater to the needs of visitors. overall, the preservation efforts have had a positive impact on tourism in yerevan.
